texts.Name: Name
texts.ApiKeyDeletionConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the API key '{0}'?
texts.CreateYourFirstApiKey: Create your first API key to get started with API access
texts.SaveThisKey: Save this key - it won't be shown again!
texts.ApiKeySecurityNotice: For security reasons, this key will only be displayed once. Make sure to copy it now.
texts.NamePlaceholder: Enter a descriptive name for this API key
texts.DescriptionPlaceholder: Optional description for this API key
texts.IsActiveHelp: Inactive API keys cannot be used for authentication
texts.ExpirationTimeHelp: Leave empty for keys that never expire
texts.ApiKeyCreationNoticeDescription: The full API key will be shown only once after creation. Make sure to copy and store it securely.
texts.NameCannotBeChanged: API key names cannot be changed after creation
texts.EditingApiKeyNoticeDescription: You are updating the metadata for this API key. The key itself cannot be changed.
texts.NextStep1: Store this key in a secure location (password manager, secrets vault, etc.)
texts.NextStep2: Never commit this key to source control or share it publicly
texts.NextStep3: If you lose this key, you'll need to create a new one
texts.IHaveCopiedTheKey: I have copied and securely stored this API key
texts.PleaseAcknowledgeCopy: Please copy and acknowledge that you have saved the API key before closing
texts.CopyToClipboardFailed: Could not copy to clipboard. Please select and copy the text manually.
texts.NoPermissionsAvailableDescription: This API key does not have any permissions available to configure
texts.UnsavedChangesConfirmationMessage: You have unsaved permission changes. Are you sure you want to close without saving?
texts.SearchApiKeys: Search API keys by name or description
texts.FocusSearchShortcut: Press Ctrl+K to focus search (Windows) or Cmd+K (Mac)
texts.ActionsColumn: Available actions for this API key
texts.ActiveStatusTooltip: This key is active and can be used for API authentication
texts.InactiveStatusTooltip: This key is inactive and cannot be used for authentication
texts.ExpiredStatusTooltip: This key has expired and cannot be used
texts.ExpiresSoonStatusTooltip: This key will expire soon (within 7 days)
texts.ValidationErrorsFound: Please correct the errors before saving
